comments: this was the most ANNOYING class, the lectures were useless, very disorganized, felt more like a high school debate class. DID NOT LEARN MUCH ABOUT AMERICAN CHILDHOOD. Test were fairly easy if you can make it through the MINDLESS discussions. Anything less than a B in this class would be Ridiculous!

Very unorganized. Lacks maturity and professionalism to be a College Professor. Has class prepare one things then decides on something different. Did not learn about "American Childhood", but learned some about Folklore.
She is a nice person, but her teaching is very unorganized and she says one thing and does another. The class is easy.
Very unorganized. Missed 2 classes in the first 2 weeks of class. Rude to students and the material in the class was useless. The most irritating class I\'ve ever taken.

First time teaching the class, and was very obvious. She has a degree in folklore, and talked more about that than American Childhood. Easiest tests I have ever taken in my life. Nice lady, but shouldn\'t teach this class.

worst class at cal state. i had a headache everytime i went to this class.she treates her students like high school student. whoever gave her a job at this school most have been sleeping when they hired this person. and she takes forever to give grades back. DONT NOT TAKE THIS TEACHER WORST PERSON AT CAL STATE SAN BERNARDINO WARNING WARNING

She was totally unprepared for this setting. Capstone with about 180 students and it was like high school all over again, loud and out of control. I went into the final not knowing if I got credit for half of the work I did. Asking and emailing did no good. Got my 4 units and nothing else from the class.

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! people talked through the entire class and she never had control of anything. she hardly ever talked about american childhood, but instead would go off on repetitive tangents. i had a headache every day after this class. worst class i\'ve taken at cal state to date.

Professor was a mess. She was not organized at all and it reflected in her class. She took 7 weeks to grade anything and was not sure what would be part of your grade. Never answers e-mails and cannot answer questions. Save your sanity...

It was her first time teaching this class this quarter so give her a break. Grading took forever and the class overall was okay. The tests are easy if you read all the stories. The project was fine but the presentations took about 3-4 weeks to get done.
